name: MyRIDE Challenge
description:
The world of motorbikes in your hands with the collectible card game MyRIDE Challenge! Collect your favourite bikes from Aprilia, Bimota, Ducati, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, MV Agusta, Suzuki, Triumph and Yamaha. Choose from 300+ cards, build your five-bike team with Sport, Naked and Historical models, and get ready for the ultimate challenge. Tune, fuse and upgrade your cards with new parts to power up your deck.

Key Features:
• MULTIPLAYER: challenge your Facebook friends to find out who's the best RIDER!
• TOURNAMENTS: participate in Tournaments every week to win the new super-powerful SPECIAL cards.
• Fast action. Build your five-bike team and get ready to conquer Donington, Road America, Imola, and other famous racing locations. The battle is about speed, acceleration, grip, handling and style. Win matches and receive new cards, gears and experience to level up.
• Collect the bikes of your dreams. 120+ models from Aprilia, Bimota, Ducati, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, MV Agusta, Suzuki, Triumph e Yamaha... and more to come.
• Tune and level your cards. Install new exhausts, suspensions, tyres and other mechanical components to build the ultimate racing machine. Fuse cards together to level up.
• New bike manufacturers, gears, events and game modes are added regularly.


-----------------------------
Some of the motorbikes that you can find in MyRIDE Challenge are:
Aprilia: RSV4 APRC ABS, TUONO and RS 250
Bimota: TESI 3D, TESI 1D and DB8 ITALIA
Ducati: Monster 696, Desmosedici RR and 1199 Panigale Superleggera
Honda: CBR1000R ABS, CBR600RR and NR750
Kawasaki: Z1000. NINJA ZX 6R and NINJA ZX 10R
KTM: 1190 RC8R, RC 390 and 1290 SUPER DUKE R
MV Agusta: BRUTALE 675, RIVALE 800 and F4
Suzuki: GSR 750, GSX R750 and GSX R1000
Triumph: DAYTONA 675, SPEED TRIPLE and STREET TRIPLE
Yamaha: MT07, YZF R6 and YZF R1
